section.title: Overview
section.para: rtp_media_server module is adding RTP and media processing functionalities to Kamailio
Kamailio is providing SIP signaling including and enpoint with Dialog state, SDP parsing and scripting language
oRTP: is providing Real-time Transport Protocol (RFC 3550)
mediastreamer2: is providing mediaprocessing functionnalities using graphs and filters, many modules are available to support various features, it should be relatively simple to integrated them.
mediastreamer2 is also providing a framework to create custom mediaprocessing modules.

section.title: log_file_name (string)
section.para: oRTP and MediaStreamer2 log file settings the log mask is not configurable : MESSAGE | WARNING | ERROR | FATAL levels are activated.
Default value is not-set (no logging to file).

section.title: rms_answer (event_route)
section.para: Create a call leg : with a SIP dialog and an RTP session call the event_route
This function can be used from REQUEST_ROUTE, REPLY_ROUTE and FAILURE_ROUTE.

example.title: rms_answer usage example

section.title: rms_hangup ()
section.para: Send a BYE, delete the RTP session and the media ressources.
This function can be used from EVENT_ROUTE.

section.title: rms_bridge (target URI, event_route)
section.para: Bridge the incoming call, create a second call leg using a UAC in a B2BUA manner, this is needed in case we want to un-bridge later, a feature not currently implemented Call the specified event_route, defaulting to [rms:bridge].
This function can be used from REQUEST_ROUTE.

example.title: rms_bridge usage example

section.title: rms_dialog_check ()
section.para: Returns true if the current SIP message it handled/known by the RMS module, else it may be handle in any other way by Kamailio.
This function can be used from REQUEST_ROUTE, REPLY_ROUTE and FAILURE_ROUTE.

example.title: rms_dialog_check usage example

section.title: rms_sip_request ()
section.para: This should be called for every in-dialog SIP request, it will be forwarded behaving as a B2BUA, the transaction will be suspended until the second leg replies.
If the SIP dialog is not found "481 Call/Transaction Does Not Exist" is returned.
This function can be used from REQUEST_ROUTE, REPLY_ROUTE and FAILURE_ROUTE.

section.title: rms_play (file, event_route)
section.para: Play a wav file, a resampler is automaticaly configured to resample and convert stereo to mono if needed.
The second parameter is the event route that will be called when the file was played.
This function can be used from EVENT_ROUTE.
